name: Pepper
info:
A popular nurse known for her patience, kindness, and smile. While known for her efficient work ethic, her body and stamina can't quite keep up. Combined with her perfectionism, she is constantly fatigued.
She was diagnosed with severe insomnia, light anxiety, and obsession, though none of the symptoms are obvious due to her strong self-discipline.
description:
Born into a wealthy Banges family, she had an above-average education and was always well-behaved. She and her family were assaulted by aberrants one day, and her parents lost their suppressors. 
They didn't "die," but became aberrants instead. Just as an Executor was about to put them out of their misery, Pepper, who survived, begged the Executor not to do it. Now they are confined somewhere, and the family wealth is being slowly depleted to pay for their care.
That's why Pepper works in the medical department at Hykros. She chose to spend the rest of her life finding a way to reverse the aberration...
like: Her parents, work, making progress in her research

skills.name: Normal Attack
skills.description: While on the ground, swing the staff to attack 5 times in a row. First Attack: Deal damage equal to 25.1% of ATK plus 1. Second Attack: Deal damage equal to 18.8% of ATK plus 1. Third Attack: Deal damage equal to 30.4% of ATK plus 2. Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to 41.4% of ATK plus 2. Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to 73.2% of ATK plus 4.

skills.name: Soaring Barrage
skills.description: While airborne or after jumping once, use normal attack to attack 5 times in a row in mid-air. First Attack: Deal damage equal to 32.5% of ATK plus 2. Second Attack: Deal damage equal to 23.5% of ATK plus 1. Third Attack: Deal damage equal to 25.5% of ATK plus 1. Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to 45.6% of ATK plus 2. Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to 47.7% of ATK plus 3.

skills.name: Moonfall
skills.description: Tap and hold normal attack while airborne to trigger Moonfall. Upon landing, deal damage once every 0.2 seconds, for a total of 57.2% of ATK plus 3 damage.

skills.name: Focused Assault
skills.description: After the third normal attack, hold the normal attack button to trigger branch attacks, consuming 300 points of endurance. First Attack: Pull in enemies in front of the user, strongly suspending them and deal damage equal to 16.1% of ATK plus 1 every 0.3 seconds (up to 4 times). Second Attack: Deal damage equal to 18.6% of ATK plus 1 at the target location and to nearby enemies every 0.3 seconds.

skills.name: Surge
skills.description: Tap normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (tap an arrow button before dodging) to trigger Surge. Each energy pulse deals damage equal to 22.6% of ATK plus 1 to targets. Grant 75 weapon charge points upon use.

skills.name: Tesseract
skills.description: Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Evasive Blast. Fire an energy orb forward, dealing damage equal to 32.1% of ATK plus 2 to targets in its path every 0.3 seconds (up to 5 times). Grant 75 weapon charge points upon use.

skills.name: Sanctuary
skills.description: Create an energy shield at the Wanderer's location. Heal allies within the shield for 81.7% of ATK plus 4 every second and reduce their damage taken by 3% for 10 seconds. 60-second cooldown.

skills.name: Swift Deliverance
skills.description: When weapon charge is full or Phantasia is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, remove all debuffs from the Wanderer and the staff continues to remove debuffs from the Wanderer and allies, plus heals nearby Wanderers and allies for 79% of ATK plus 4 HP for 7 seconds.

weapon_type.name: Volt
weapon_type.description: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will strongly paralyze targets for 1 second and electrify them for 6 seconds, removing all their buffs and dealing damage equal to 106% of ATK. Electrified targets can't receive any buffs for the next 6 seconds.

advancement: Heal all teammates within 10 meters for 100% of ATK after using a dodge skill.
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by 10%.
Normal attacks also fire two missiles, each dealing damage equal to 5% of ATK to the target and restoring 5 weapon charge points.
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by 20%.
Increase speed of obtaining weapon charge by 20% (not applicable to missile attacks).
Grant all teammates within range 60% damage reduction whenever a skill dispels control effects from the target.

traits.name: Revival
traits.description: When Pepper spends satiety to restore HP, increase restoration effect by 100%.

traits.name: Source
traits.description: When Pepper spends satiety to restore HP, increase restoration effect by 200%.
